name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dictionary for Google Chrome - Synonyms, Definition
name.hu,id: Google Dictionary online app extension - Synonyms, Definition

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explaining or clarify a term with google dictionary. Get meaning from vocabulary in popup. Easy and handy google dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,et,f:
Open Power Dict Dictionary Thesaurus: Synonyms allows you to view definitions, synonyms, and antonyms easily as you browse the web. Simply highlight or double-click on a word to instantly see its meaning in a pop-up bubble, without leaving the page. Perfect for enhancing your vocabulary and comprehension across any website.

Key Features:
-- Instant word definitions, along with synonyms and antonyms.
-- Seamless integration with your web browsing experience.
-- Lightweight and fast, providing meanings and word alternatives without delays.
-- Audio functionality that reads out the correct pronunciation of words.

IMPORTANT:

-- The pop-up bubble will not work in tabs that were open prior to installation. After installing this extension, either reload your open tabs or restart Google chrome.
-- Note that all extensions are disabled on Chrome Web Store pages (including this one). Do not test the extension on this page; it will not work!
-- If the extension is not working for you, please make sure it's up to date. Visit chrome://extensions/, click the "Update extensions now" button, then restart Google chrome.

Disclosure: This extension uses the Amazon affiliate program to generate revenue. By using this extension, you help support its development and maintenance.
